MetaScope.seoSectionTitle: How MetaScope helps in digital forensics
MetaScope.seoSectionDesc: MetaScope was developed for digital forensics applied to real scenarios. The platform combines forensic file analysis, image authenticity verification, EXIF metadata inspection and SHA-256 hash integrity checking. In investigations with fraud risk, it also allows analyzing suspicious links and screenshots with OCR to support technical decisions with greater confidence.
MetaScope.faqSubtitle: Direct answers to the most common questions about analysis, privacy and result interpretation.
MetaScope.faq1Q: Does MetaScope replace a forensic examination?
MetaScope.faq1A: No. It is a technical support tool for triage, validation and documentation. In critical cases, complementary specialized analysis is recommended.
MetaScope.faq2Q: How to analyze links safely (without click risk)?
MetaScope.faq2A: Use "safe mode": copy the link address without opening it (right-click → "Copy link address") and paste for analysis. Alternatively, send a screenshot of the message for OCR evaluation. This reduces the risk of opening malicious content.
MetaScope.faq3Q: Does MetaScope "confirm" if something was made by AI?
MetaScope.faq3A: It points out technical signs and provides a score with justifications. Like any automated detection, it is not 100% conclusive.
MetaScope.faq4Q: Does the system store my files?
MetaScope.faq4A: No. Processing occurs in the browser and there is no server-side storage.
MetaScope.faq5A: No. Geolocation is only displayed when the file contains EXIF GPS data. Many platforms remove metadata when reprocessing images.
MetaScope.faq6Q: What is SHA-256 hash and why does it matter?
MetaScope.faq6A: It is a "fingerprint" of the file. It serves to verify integrity and support the traceability of the analyzed material.
MetaScope.faq7Q: What does MetaScope check in suspicious links and screenshots?
MetaScope.faq7A: It looks for signs of phishing and fraud (e.g. homography/IDN, typosquatting, artificial urgency and social engineering manipulation). When available, it can cross-reference information with external reputation sources for corroboration.
MetaScope.faq8A: Access is controlled (no public sign-up at the moment). You request a test and receive credentials for evaluation.
MetaScope.transparencyDesc: Automated analyses are based on technical evidence and may vary depending on the file and available metadata. Use the results as support and complement when necessary.

CondoHub.faq1Q: Does the Resident Dossier and its infractions hold up legally in assemblies?
CondoHub.faq1A: Yes. The system writes exact timestamp entries. It inherits evidence-chain architectures backing decisions inherently.
CondoHub.faq2Q: How do the Digital Time Clock alerts for the staff actually limit liability?
CondoHub.faq2A: Proactive alerting to the manager regarding approaching shift limits or break violations avoids later massive HR lawsuits.
CondoHub.faq3Q: How do you structure Data Privacy (LGPD/GDPR)?
CondoHub.faq3A: Via Single-Tenant instantiation. Your property data rests inside a totally isolated container physically blind to neighbors natively.
CondoHub.faq4Q: Can warning histories be secretly deleted by malicious staff?
CondoHub.faq4A: No. Soft-deletes keep the item hidden from normal views but display prominently on audit reports with authors attached inevitably.
CondoHub.faq5Q: Is financial billing and invoice issuance done directly inside the platform?
CondoHub.faq5A: It functions through a strict Ticket workflow directed to the external property manager company explicitly to avoid duplicate gateways.
CondoHub.faq6Q: Do front desk agents see my bill requests and financial details?
CondoHub.faq6A: No. Deeply rooted framework constraints ensure specific administrative modules render entirely invisible to concierge permissions securely.
CondoHub.faq7Q: Can multiple properties be managed collectively?
CondoHub.faq7A: A multi-condo dashboard (Master View) is being refined for administration firms allowing wide views without database fusion technically.
CondoHub.faq8A: Platform strictly digitizes the flow controls, human logging and concierge screens natively over integrating directly into external hardware right now.
